locked.title: Locked
locked.pillarLocked: Upgrade to premium to access this pillar.
locked.ageVerify: We couldn't verify your age. Update your profile with your date of birth to unlock this section.
locked.under18: Available for learners under 18. You are {{age}} years old.
locked.at18: Available at age 18. You are {{age}} years old.

replay.title: Unlock Replay
replay.note: You won't earn coins when replaying this game. The game will be locked again after you complete the replay.
replay.notAvailable: Replay not available. Upgrade to premium to access this game.

tooltips.gameCompleted: Game completed! Unlock replay to play again.
tooltips.completePrevious: Complete the previous game to unlock

toasts.upgradeMoreGames: Upgrade to premium to access more than {{count}} games per pillar.
toasts.completePreviousFirst: Complete the previous game first to unlock this game!
toasts.alreadyCollected: You've already collected all HealCoins for this game. Unlock replay to play again!
toasts.notAvailablePlan: This game is not available in your current plan. Upgrade to premium to access more games.
toasts.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance! You need {{cost}} HealCoins to unlock replay.
toasts.replayFailed: Failed to unlock replay. Please try again.
